text: As a medical doctor myself, I can say with confidence that Dr. Karen is the best general practitioner I’ve encountered in Singapore. She is truly patient-centric, combining deep clinical insight with a thoughtful focus on long-term health—not just symptom relief. Her approach reflects genuine care and professionalism. The clinic staff are equally warm and attentive, creating a supportive and welcoming environment. Highly recommended.

Dr Karen is an excellent and experienced GP, and has been my trusted healthcare provider since 2016. She listens patiently, conscientiously keeps my records up to date and will advise on an appropriate course of action / treatment each time.

I'm a relatively new patient of Dr. Karen's but she has proven to have excellent bedside manners during every single visit. She always explains things clearly and is one of the friendliest doctors I have ever met. The clinic assistants are also really polite and attentive! I find that my needs are well taken care of here, and there usually isn't a long waiting time :)
Doctor Karen is an extremely attentive, caring and understanding doctor. The assistant here is also very nice. This clinic is located in the second floor of Millenia Walk.
I Was turn away by the clinic assistant at 5pm... when their closing time was at 5.30pm cause thier Meeting is more important then serving their sick patient ... bad service...!!!
